data.text: @puneetdawer Sir, please note that camphor is neither allowed in hand luggage nor in check-in luggage.~ Nandita

@parveshgoyal303 Mr Goyal, we believe our customer relations has addressed your concern. We request your understanding on the same. ~Sheetal

@rajkumarshukla4 Sir, please note that we don’t provide a terminal change facility as passengers need to take care of that on their own. You may reach out to our airport staff for assistance.~ Nandita
@Abhishek2154090 Sir, thank you for your appreciation. We are glad to know our staff could assist you well. We'll surely pass on your kudos to our team right away.~ Nandita #GoIndiGo

@farzinasundaria Ma'am, since the passenger had reported at the boarding gate after the gate closure time, our airport staff were not in a position to accept the passenger for the flight. We believe our team offered re-accommodation and the passenger accepted the same. Thank you! ~Sheetal

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @beingDJ Sir, we never wish our passengers to go through any hassle. You may click on the plan B link click here https://t.co/2OUXTgsgoO to book an alternate flight or cancel at no charge. Thanks! ~Sheetal
@bizsprite Sir, we believe our customer relations team is in touch with you. Please write back to them for further assistance on this. ~Prahlad
@gsaive_009 Sir, we checked with our team and unfortunately, nothing as such was located on that flight. ~Prahlad
@Cheapforme_net Hi, you may carry your charger in your cabin baggage. Let us know via DM if you have any queries. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Amit8Mehra Sir, we are humbled to read this. We look forward to see you on board soon. ~Diyashi
@pradeepkurupath Sir, it is prohibited to carry. Please share your PNR or the sector you're traveling to/from via DM so we may assist you further. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Vignesh42799144 We wish you a pleasant time flying with us!😊 #goIndiGo ~Sheetal
@garimas48380239 Please know, we have noted your feedback and shall update the same with the concerned team. Hoping to serve better in future. ~Diyashi (2/2)
@garimas48380239 Ma'am, we regret the unpleasant experience. We take all the actions required to control mosquitoes and fumigate before the passengers boards the aircraft.  (1/2)
@JaykumarTK Hi, please share the transaction details along with your PNR via DM so we may get this resolved at the earliest. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@tvkk Hello, allow us some time time to get it checked and get back to you with an update, ~Diyashi
@imtejaspatil07 We regret the inconvenience Mr Patil. We have duly noted your feedback and shall raised it to the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@DhongdeSupriya Dr Dhongde, we keep evaluating and optimizing our flight schedule and be assured that your feedback will be passed on to the concerned team. We appreciate you reaching out to us. ~Diyashi

urls.title: FAQs About On-board Facilities - IndiGo
urls.description: Read frequently asked questions about in-flight services related to pre-book snacks, alcohol, water & food on-board IndiGo flights. Learn more at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @prashbio Sir, We do not provide earplugs and cotton on-board. Therefore, we recommend that passengers carry their own chewing gums, cotton, and/or ear plugs for their comfort. For more information, please visit https://t.co/GVTH7wWiAQ. ~Kritika
@vij_blues Hello, could you please share your PNR via DM  along with the picture of the power bank so we may get it checked.  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Blueshant Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@suraj12007868 Sir, we are constantly expanding our routes. We have duly noted your feedback and share raise it to the concerned team. Stay tuned. ~Diyashi
@Soubhik3001 Mr Mazumdar, please know that our prices are dynamic in nature and the fares may increase or decrease at any given time. Looking forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi
@piyushsdaga Sir, we regret the experience and sharing your feedback with our concerned team. ~Prahlad
@KanchiVasavada We regret the inconvenience caused. We are raising the matter with the concerned team for review. Allow us some time to get it checked. ~Diyashi
@SiddharthK2187 Mr Khandelwal, we regret the inconvenience caused. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AshishhCaptain Thank you sir, for the appreciation. Hoping so see you on board soon. ~Diyashi
@d_subhasish Sir, we regret to hear this. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@BMChethanKumar1 We regret the inconvenience caused, could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@shiva_ip2006 Hello, we regret to hear this. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update.

urls.title: Baggage International Connection
urls.description: IndiGo offers great prices on purchasing prepaid excess baggage when you are travelling on your domestic IndiGo flight and connecting to/from another international airline. This allowance is over and above your eligible baggage allowance. #Please note that if the payment is to be made in any other currency than Indian Rupee, the fee(s) will be calculated as per the conversion rate prevalent at the time of payment. Adult(s) (> 12 years) Book extra seat(s) for less and travel with more space, comfort & 10

data.text: @SuruSudhirKumar Sir, you can pre-book the baggage 6 hours prior to the departure of the flight from the website, by clicking on the edit booking option. For more information please visit https://t.co/V5Wxl1pJZn. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@66thakur99 Mr Sambyal, please carry it in cabin baggage. ~Linda

@SajjadInamdar5 Mr Inamdar, it seems last few passengers are deplaning. Be rest assured, necessary pit stop duties are performed efficiently during the turn around time to ensure smooth functioning. ~Linda

@tsrinivasraghu Mr Raghu, we never wish to depart our aircrafts leaving our customers behind. However, please be informed check-in counter closes 60 mins & boarding gate 25 mins prior to the departure. Reporting beyond the closure time can lead to boarding denial. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@damodarsharmaa Mr Sharma, we regret the experience. Please DM us your PNR so we can take a closer look & share your feedback with the concerned team right away for necessary review. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
